elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the name of your cooperative/DAO?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is the purpose of your cooperative/DAO?
elements.description: Please make the statement clear and concise, with no capitalization or punctuation.
elements.placeHolder: create and support a member owned comic book club

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is the Ethereum address of your DAO?
elements.description: Not the URL where you interact with it, but the actual Ethereum address.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is the name of your DAO's token?
elements.description: The ticker symbol of the token.
